vlive.korean: 그런데 제작진의 속셈일 수도 있어요 - 이렇게 하나씩 고르는 거야? But maybe it's producing team's trick. - This is how this game goes? 듣기 View video BTS : Run BTS! 2019 - EP.61
vlive.english: But maybe it's producing team's trick. - This is how this game goes?

vlive.korean: 도대체 속셈이 뭐예요? "What are you up to?" 듣기 View video V DRAMA : [크리미널마인드 Voice Only #4] 문채원이 이준기에게 숨기고 있는 진실은?
그런 속셈이 있는 사람이에요. That's what he schemes. 듣기 View video V MOVIE : 이병헌+강동원+김우빈 <마스터> 무비토크 라이브 ' Movie Talk Live'
[속셈 파악] 진짜 지구 대표. [I know what's on his mind] The ace in the world. 듣기 View video GOT7 : GOT7의 하드캐리 6화 (GOT7's Hard Carry ep.6)
vlive.english: [I know what's on his mind] The ace in the world.

vlive.korean: 이거 진짜 안 주겠다는 속셈이야. -아니, 날씨도 우중충한데. Their intention is not to give us any food. - The weather is gloomy too. 듣기 View video IDOL x IDOL : A-DAILY - 에이데일리 '즐거운 가을 소풍!!'
vlive.english: Their intention is not to give us any food. - The weather is gloomy too.

examples.korean: She had no axe to grind and was only acting out of concern for their safety. 발음듣기 그녀는 다른 속셈은 없이 오직 그들의 안전을 우려하여 행동을 취하고 있었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She had no axe to grind and was only acting out of concern for their safety. 발음

examples.korean: He has an ulterior object in view. 발음듣기 그는 어떤 딴 속셈이 있다. Dong-a's Prime English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He has an ulterior object in view. 발음

examples.korean: I wonder if she has an ax to grind. 발음듣기 제이미에게 뭔가 다른 속셈이 있는 거 아니야? Neungyule
examples.english: I wonder if she has an ax to grind. 발음

examples.korean: I know what you are thinking. 발음듣기 나는 당신의 속셈을 안다 Neungyule
